document.full_text: an experimental vaccine helped monkeys with a form of the aids virus control the infection for more than a year, suggesting it may lead to a vaccine for people, u.s. researchers said on wednesday.
document.title: experimental aids vaccine shows promise in monkeys
lines_and_colors: an experimental vaccine helped monkeys with a form of the aids virus control the infection for more than a year, suggesting it may lead to a vaccine for people, u.s. researchers said on wednesday.
